name: MDLLight
desc: The abstract superclass for objects that describe light sources in a scene.

items.name: func irradiance(atPoint: vector_float3) -> Unmanaged<CGColor>
items.desc: Returns the radiance of the light as received at a specific point in the same scene.

items.name: func irradiance(atPoint: vector_float3, colorSpace: CGColorSpace) -> Unmanaged<CGColor>
items.desc: Returns the radiance of the light as received at a specific point in the same scene, expressed using the specified color space.

items.name: var colorSpace: String
items.desc: The name of the Core Graphics color space to be used for interpreting the light's color information.

items.name: enum MDLLightType
items.desc: Options for the shape and style of illumination provided by a light, used by the lightType property.
